alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:23PM CDT until August 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Bay Minette to 3 miles northwest of Daphne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daphne, Fairhope, Bay Minette, Spanish Fort, Robertsdale, Loxley, Stapleton, Summerdale, and Silverhill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging wind and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
